requirements.item: Provide a dedicated examples view that does not alter live chat behavior.
Include four distinct message UI variants: Ledger Cards, Timeline Stream, Studio Panels, Editorial Notes.
Allow switching between variants inside the examples view.
Use sample user/AI content (no avatars or 'Claude' naming).

e2eTests.name: Cycle message UI variants
steps: Switch to Timeline Stream and verify layout changes
Switch to Studio Panels and verify layout changes
Switch to Editorial Notes and verify layout changes

acceptanceCriteria.item: Examples view is accessible without disrupting normal sessions.
Each variant clearly distinguishes user vs AI without names or avatars.
Layouts look intentional and visually distinct across variants.
